Request

Response

200 OK
Content-Type: application/json
{
    "meta": {
        "previous": null, 
        "total_count": 1, 
        "offset": 0, 
        "limit": 20, 
        "next": null
    },

            "resource_type": "user", 
            "score": 0.31819803, 
            "email": "nobody@vosae.com", 
            "full_name": "", 
            "id": "5231cbd64ab63c53dc900474"
        }
    ]
}

Request

GET /search/

Response

200 OK
Content-Type: application/xml; charset=utf-8
<response>
  <objects type="list">
    <object type="hash">
      <resource_type>user</resource_type>
      <score type="float">0.31819803</score>
      <email>nobody@vosae.com</email>
      <full_name/>
      <id>5231cbd64ab63c53dc900474</id>
    </object>
  </objects>
  <meta type="hash">
    <next type="null"/>
    <total_count type="integer">1</total_count>
    <previous type="null"/>
    <limit type="integer">20</limit>
    <offset type="integer">0</offset>
  </meta>
</response>
